description: This Java class 'PictogramController' provides REST API endpoints for managing 'Pictogram' entities, including CRUD operations such as list, create, get, update, and delete pictograms. It uses Spring Boot annotations for routing, validation, and API documentation with Swagger/OpenAPI annotations. The controller interacts with a repository to persist and retrieve data.

classes.name: PictogramController
classes.description: Controller class that exposes REST endpoints for CRUD operations on Pictogram entities

classes.name: ResourceNotFoundException
classes.description: Exception class used internally for signaling resource not found errors

methods.name: list
methods.description: Returns a list of pictograms filtered by ownerId

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new pictogram after validating input and ensuring no duplicates

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a specific pictogram by its id

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing pictogram identified by id with provided data

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a pictogram identified by id
